item.title: Salvador Perez's Incredible Year at the Plate
item.description: Salvador Perez had one of his best years at the plate in a while. library(tidyverse)

item.title: Nebraska Baseball 2020-2021
item.description: At the beginning of the 2021 baseball season Nebraska was looking to come out firing on all cylinders for Will Boltâ€™s first full season as the head coach for the Huskers, after the 2020 season was cut short due to COVID-19 striking the nation. The Huskers had previously made it to the Big Ten championship in 2019 only to lose to a talented Ohio State team, and continue on to lose out of the regional at Oklahoma State.
